title: Monday Post Show (05-3-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (05-3-21)
description:
Bobby wants everyone to know that you should listen to the radio show BEFORE listening to this podcast! Bobby checks in with Scuba Steve who was in San Francisco over the weekend and seemed like he wants to move back. Morgan2 went to a wedding in Wichita, KS and Amy went to visit her brother in Florida. Bobby talks about how he is going next weekend to Oklahoma for Caitlin’s sister’s wedding shower. Eddie also shares his voice acting demo with Bobby for him to judge.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
